programmes.name: Phase 1 (London-Birmingham)
programmes.description: London Euston to Birmingham Curzon Street. £40.5bn spent to April 2025, £25.3bn allocated 2026-2030.

programmes.name: Euston Station & Approach
programmes.description: Tunnelling to Euston confirmed Nov 2024 (not terminating at Old Oak Common).

clients.notes: Phase 1 only (London-Birmingham). Phase 2 to Crewe/Manchester cancelled Oct 2023. UK's largest infrastructure project. 225mph design speed. £40.5bn spent to Apr 2025. Phase 1 opening target 2029-2033. Euston terminus confirmed.

clients.name: Heathrow Airport
clients.notes: UK's largest airport. HAL's third runway proposal confirmed as basis for expansion (Nov 2025). Draft ANPS consultation summer 2026, final ANPS end-2026. DCO process 2027-29. New runway target opening 2035. 80m passengers/year capacity target.
clients.source: Heathrow 2.0 Masterplan, DfT ANPS Update Nov 2025
